sentences.sContent: From the base of the rock on which I stood, a moss-covered ledge stuck into deep water.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the base of the rock on which I stood, a moss-covered ledge stuck into deep water.
sentences.sCn: 从我所站立的岩石的底部，一个满是苔藓的暗礁伸进深水里。

synos.tran: [家具]壁架；突出之部份；暗礁；矿层

remMethod.val: l + edge(边缘) → 位于边缘处的东西 → 突出部分
